title: Strengthening of Clarkson-McCarthy inequalities with several operators
abstract:
Strengthening of two Clarkson-McCarthy inequalities with several operators is
established. These not only confirm a conjecture of the author in [Israel J.
Math. 2024], but also improve results of Hirazallah-Kittaneh in [Integral
Equations Operator Theory 60 (2008)] and Bhatia-Kittaneh in [Bull. London Math.
Soc. 36 (2004)]. We also give a generalization of a result for pairs
$(A_i,B_i), 1\le i\le n$ and obtain another form of another inequality. The
infinite cases of these inequalities are also discussed. The method is an
extension of the result obtained by Bourin and Lee in [Linear Algebra Appl. 601
(2020)]. Some related eigenvalue inequalities are also obtained.
